name: Pacmanjs
description:
Pacmanjs 1.03

A Pacman clonish game in JavaScript. Made for GameDev challenge.  Credits to elsewhere for sprite image and sounds. Programming by mystikkogames. 1.03 is the stable release! 1.0 -> 1.03: very minor tweaks.

Have fun!

Keys:
  • ( P ) Pause
  • ( esc ) Back to home screen
  • ( <- ^ v -> ) for player1
  • ( wasd ) for player2
  • In mobile click around the pacman to move
Game Modes:
  • Single player 
  • player1 vs ai
  • player1 vs player2
  • Team game
